title: Game-Based Collaborative Learning Program for Enhancing Data Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics and Data Visualization Concepts Understanding
context.additional_context: Cultivation of data analysis skills through game-based collaborative learning in non-formal educational settings

learning_goals: Perform data collection-analysis-interpretation processes with over 80% accuracy through simulations using real data
Execute and evaluate effective communication strategies with peers during data-driven decision-making at least three times through collaborative game activities
Explain the process of deriving key insights by manipulating data visualization tools in VR environments within five minutes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
